about_the_game:
Endvasion is a Real Time Strategy, Base Building, Creature Management game where you manage the bad creatures and rid the world of the goodie-two-shoes heroes.


Embrace Your Inner Villain

In a world where good always wins, it’s time for the bad guys to rise—and invade!

Endvasion is a darkly whimsical strategy and base-building game that lets you lead your mischievous minions on an epic campaign against the forces of goodness. Build your sinister empire from scratch, convert enemy land into your lair, and unlock the secrets of mystical portals that transport you to dangerous, ever-changing realms.

Key Features:

  • Build Your Dark Domain:
    Start with a modest base and loyal worker creatures. Construct unique structures and training facilities to expand your power and prepare your minions for battle.

  • Land Conversion & Resource Mastery:
    Convert the territory around you to harness vital resources. Every patch of land reclaimed brings unpredictable events—friendly allies may rally to your cause, or enemy forces could challenge your progress.

  • Mystical Portals & Rituals:
    Sacrifice specific creatures to unlock ancient portals. Each portal teleports you and your minions to a temporary, procedurally generated land with unique objectives—whether it’s defeating a formidable boss or converting the entire realm.

  • League-Based Progression:
    Inspired by the best league systems, enjoy fresh challenges and limited-time events that keep gameplay dynamic and offer rewarding, exclusive content.

  • A Twist on the Good vs. Evil Narrative:
    Invert the traditional tale by leading the “bad guys.” Wield dark humor and devious strategy to challenge the conventions of heroism.

Will you conquer every realm, or will the forces of righteousness thwart your sinister ambitions? The invasion has begun—seize your destiny in Endvasion!

content_descriptors.notes:
Endvasion features dark fantasy themes that may include the following mature content:

Violence:

The game involves strategic combat where players control demonic creatures to repel invading forces. The violence depicted includes melee combat, magical attacks, and the destruction of enemy units and structures.
While the violence is presented in a stylized, fantasy manner, it can be intense, with visual effects such as blood splatters, explosions, and the disintegration of defeated enemies.

Dark Themes:

The storyline involves morally ambiguous situations, where traditional notions of good and evil are subverted. Players may find themselves sympathizing with or rooting for characters typically portrayed as villains in other narratives.
The game explores themes of invasion, survival, and the defense of one's homeland, which might be intense for some players.

Mature Humor:

There may be instances of dark or sardonic humor, often centered around the bad guys’ perspective of the world. While this humor is intended to be entertaining, it may include references that some players could find unsettling.

What Endvasion Does Not Include:

There are no depictions of sexual acts or nudity in the game.
The game does not include references to or depictions of sexual assault, non-consensual sex, drug and alcohol abuse, or self-harm.
